docs.text: To learn more about Project Olly visit olly.nfmstudios.com . To follow along with our development via our development roadmap visit our trello page . What is Project Olly? Project Olly is a tournament hosting and gaming based platform built by experienced gaming industry members. Getting started So you just got your brand new Project Olly instance and are ready to get rolling. Project layout
